description:
Tobishima Shou is a man who worms his way into a lady`s good graces, then sets up his bag to take upskirt footage while on a date with her. Remi falls for his ploy at one point, but is rescued by Chuu-san, who had recognized Tobishima`s name from his last school. After Chuu-san threatens him, he flees.
Source: Sket Dance Wikia
name: Tobishima Shou
